ygData.subject: Re: wizard sites?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lots of sites around.  Go to allakazam s web page and look under classes for links.   Stick with all 3 weapon skills at each level.  You will need each one at
ygData.messageBody:
Lots of sites around. Go to allakazam's web page and look under classes for
links. Stick with all 3 weapon skills at each level. You will need each
one at some point in the game to effectively use the weapons available for
your level. Ultimately you will not be weilding anything

> From: "Jeff Bleich" <dolph@...>
>
> Does anyone know of any good Wizard sites to goto? I'm new at the wizard
> class and joined vallon zek to kill... I bielieve this is one of the best
> classes to play at pvp. Any help would be great on where to get damask ,
> what should i swing 2 handed staffs or daggers?
